channel.title: World of Tanks
channel.description: As title says. It's still in closed beta but Gamestop is giving out free beta keys until they run out, check out [url='https://www.gamespot.com/event/codes/world-of-tanks/?om_act=convert&om_clk=picks&tag=picks;title;5']this[/url] link. A pretty interesting game, albeit you get absolutely hammered a lot at the start, your starting tanks suck and everyone owns your ass. Just get rid of that rambo mentality and work with the team, preferably in small groups. It does attempt to be a simulator and I guess that works out for it pretty well without making it completely unfriendly to new users. So yeah, discussions, opinions, raging and cool story bro's here.

the consequences of failure are very small

Read full topic

item.title: World of Tanks
item.dc:creator: adrienndion
item.description:
I have never played before, but what I understand, there is very little similarity. The learning curve at WOT is much more superficial, the consequences of failure are very small, and anybody can come and play alone.

Read full topic

item.title: World of Tanks
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
hercule poirots nutsack:

Tanks for this!! looks like a barrel of laughs. Tank games do have a good track record after all. and the price is right too since we dont have to shell out.

I see what you did there. I think that’s the funniest post you’ve made.

Read full topic

item.description:
It’s free during beta, you get 150 gold every day but from what I’ve understood you’ll have to pay for gold once it goes public.

item.title: World of Tanks
item.dc:creator: samzala
item.description:
As title says. It’s still in closed beta but Gamestop is giving out free beta keys until they run out, check out this link. A pretty interesting game, albeit you get absolutely hammered a lot at the start, your starting tanks suck and everyone owns your ass. Just get rid of that rambo mentality and work with the team, preferably in small groups. It does attempt to be a simulator and I guess that works out for it pretty well without making it completely unfriendly to new users. So yeah, discussions, opinions, raging and cool story bro’s here.
